drupalNodeEvent.title: Online Research in China in a Time of No Access: Methods, Techniques and Tips

field_speakers.processed: Professor Angela Xiao Wu (New York University); Professor Samantha Hoffmann (Australian Strategic Policy Institute);Professor Christian Göbel (University of Vienna)

field_description.processed:
Online panel with:

Professor Angela Xiao Wu (New York University): ‘Digital Media as Intelligence (?)’

Professor Samantha Hoffmann (Australian Strategic Policy Institute): ‘Producing Policy-relevant China Research and Analysis in an Era of Strategic Competition’

Professor Christian Göbel (University of Vienna): ‘Researching Chinese Politics from a Distance: Opportunities and Pitfalls of Working with Online Data’

Moderators:
Professor Rachel Murphy (University of Oxford)
Professor Genia Kostka (Freie Universität Berlin)

This is an event jointly organised by the Oxford-Berlin Partnership, the University of Oxford China Centre and the Berlin Contemporary China Network (BCCN)
